trend.title: Kayutangan
trend.headline: Kampung Kayutangan is an area with heritage buildings with Dutch colonial architecture, ranging from residential houses, restaurants, schools, shops, and offices.

trend.title: Pantai Balekambang
trend.headline: Balekambang Beach is a beach on the south coast which is located on the edge of the Indonesian Ocean

trend.title: Kampung Warna Warni
trend.headline: The first tourist village in Malang City in the form of a row of houses with colorful paint that adorns each wall of the house.
